digital_asset.title: A Home for your Digital Assets
digital_asset.description: Wallets are used to send, receive, store, and display digital assets like Ethereum and NFTs.

login.title: A New Way to Log In
login.description: Instead of creating new accounts and passwords on every website, just connect your wallet.

scan.title: Scan with
scan.mobile: Scan with your phone to download on iOS or Android

get_started.access_browser: Access your wallet right from your favorite web browser.
get_started.access_mobile: Use the mobile wallet to explore the world of Ethereum.
get_started.title: GET

wallet.title: Get a Wallet
wallet.description: A wallet is used to send, receive, store, and display digital assets. It's also a new way to log in, without needing to create new accounts and passwords on every website.

not_found.title: Not what you're looking for?
not_found.description: Select a wallet on the main screen to get started with a different wallet provider.
